磶字的基本解释

磶
xì
柱子下面的础石。

磶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》思積切，入昔，心。］
承柱的圆石墩。

磶字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磶； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页836第28
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?思積切，音昔。柱下石。【博雅】礎磶，磌礩也。【張衡·西京賦】雕楹玉磶，繡栭雲楣。

磶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
磶字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
xì
The foundation stone under the pillar.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xì］
["Guangyun" thinking and cutting, into the past, heart. ]
Cobblestone piers with pillars.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　磶; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 836 28
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Thinking and cutting, the sound. Under the pillar. [Liberal Arts] The foundation is the foundation. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Carved jade frieze, embroidered frieze cloud.
